p.2: Greetings for the day! Hope you're keeping safe and doing well.
p.4: Kindly find the JD below for your reference and let me know your interest ASAP, so that we can proceed further with the submission process positively.
p.5: Below is the job description for the position
p.12: The Sr. Full Stack Developer performs system analyses and programming work developing, designing, implementing, maintaining, and enhancing software application programs, operating systems, and databases using Angular 8.3.6, JavaScript, Java, and SQL. This position works within an agile team on new or modified products to help improve operational results, user experience, and organizational effectiveness. Additionally, responsibilities include conducting market research, collaborating with marketing, technical and manufacturing specialists, and developing prototypes

li: Deliver technical solutions based on requirements of product team. Actively participate with agile team to identify non-functional requirements to support product roadmap.
li.1: Identify and develop solutions to address technical debt.
li.2: Identifies best practices for technical implementation and coding standards and works with team to implement standards. Accesses programs and work with agile team to identify user problems and design new or existing systems.
li.3: Evaluates user requirements, writes specifications, and codes, and installs and documents necessary programs.
li.4: Progresses or modifies new/existing software applications programs of moderate complexity and scope.
li.5: Designs, develops, tests, debugs, implements, and prepares flow charts for both new and existing systems.
li.6: Deploys software tools, processes, and metrics.
li.7: Detects problems; audits accuracy and relevance of information; uses sound judgment to generate and evaluate alternatives, and make recommendations incorporating feedback from customers, agile team and in-house teams on product strategy and finding ways to expand product market reach.
li.8: Keeping up to date with industry trends and technology developments.

li: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration, Mathematics or a directly related field and/or equivalent years of work experience.
li.1: 5+ years of experience in application and software systems development.
li.2: Strong SQL skills (SQL Developer experience a plus), familiarity with Stored Procedures, and excellent data analysis and quantitate skills.
li.3: Strong knowledge of full stack development and proficiency in Angular 8.3.6, SQL, and PL/SQL and Java.
li.5: Experience with developing solutions that take advantage of AWS/Cloud platforms.
li.7: Experience working with Agile teams required, DevSecOps preferred.
li.8: Experience with how to write applications in a Containerized architecture. i.e., Docker based applications.
li.9: Experience with architecting and developing applications that support zero downtime deployments.
li.10: Strong knowledge of information technology and data processing enough to be able to review program specifications, design programs, and write or modify code.
li.11: Strong knowledge of the principles, methods, and tools for analyzing and developing software test and evaluation procedures.
li.12: Familiarity with health care and/or insurance industries preferred.

li.1: The Connect for Health Colorado office is in the North Tech Center area of Denver, near the intersection of I-25 and I-225
li.2: Work schedule may include some non-traditional hours, weekends and evening events.
li.3: Core office hours, typically 8am-5pm with some flexibility
